notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All the authors discussed and planned the paper; A.-M.C., S.J., B.Š. and I.J. drafted the manuscript; A.-M.C. performed SC-CO 2 extraction; M.K. and Z.M. preformed HS-SPME, HD, and analysis of VOCs by gas chromatography; K.A. performed GC-FID analysis for fatty acids; B.Š. performed antifungal testing; S.P. performed freeze-drying of C. bursa; I.J. and S.J. reviewed and edited the manuscript; I.J. funding acquisition.
